thread.title: EDC appoints banks for long five-year, IPTs G+34bp area

title: EDC appoints banks for long five-year, IPTs G+34bp area
text: March 13, 2018 / 4:18 PM / in 13 minutes EDC appoints banks for long five-year, IPTs G+34bp area Melissa Song Loong 1 Min Read LONDON, March 13 (IFR) - Export Development Canada has mandated Deutsche Bank, HSBC and TD for a Dec 2023 sterling bond, with IPTs at 34bp area over 2.25% Sep 2023 Gilts. Lux listing. Format: RegS bearer. Denoms: £100k + £1k. Target Market: Professional & Eligible Counterparties (all distribution channels). Taking IOIs, expect tomorrow’s business. The issuer is rated Aaa/AAA. The banks will be paid a fee by the Issuer in respect of the placement of the securities. (Reporting by Melissa Song Loong)
